mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
insert into member (id, password, name, address, phone) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone})
update member set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from userhouseinfo where id = #{id} and aptCode=#{aptCode}
mapper.select: select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from userhouseinfo uh, houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where uh.id = #{id} and h.aptCode = uh.aptCode order by aptName
